name: R5-Slot-R4B-Slot
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Slot into FHIR R4B

element.display: A slot of time on a schedule that may be available for booking appointments

target.display: A slot of time on a schedule that may be available for booking appointments
target.comment: R5 `Slot` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot`

element.display: The style of appointment or patient that may be booked in the slot (not service type)

target.display: The style of appointment or patient that may be booked in the slot (not service type)
target.comment: R5 `Slot.appointmentType` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Slot.appointmentType` - appointmentType changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1)

element.display: Comments on the slot to describe any extended information. Such as custom constraints on the slot

target.display: Comments on the slot to describe any extended information. Such as custom constraints on the slot
target.comment: R5 `Slot.comment` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot.comment`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `Slot.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot.contained`

element.display: Date/Time that the slot is to conclude

target.display: Date/Time that the slot is to conclude
target.comment: R5 `Slot.end` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot.end`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `Slot.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Slot.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R5 `Slot.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot.id`

element.display: External Ids for this item

target.display: External Ids for this item
target.comment: R5 `Slot.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Slot.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R5 `Slot.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Slot.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R5 `Slot.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R5 `Slot.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Slot.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: This slot has already been overbooked, appointments are unlikely to be accepted for this time

target.display: This slot has already been overbooked, appointments are unlikely to be accepted for this time
target.comment: R5 `Slot.overbooked` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot.overbooked`

element.display: The schedule resource that this slot defines an interval of status information

target.display: The schedule resource that this slot defines an interval of status information
target.comment: R5 `Slot.schedule` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot.schedule`

element.display: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment

target.display: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment
target.comment: R5 `Slot.serviceCategory` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot.serviceCategory`

element.display: The type of appointments that can be booked into this slot (ideally this would be an identifiable service - which is at a location, rather than the location itself). If provided then this overrides the value provided on the Schedule resource

target.display: The type of appointments that can be booked into this slot (ideally this would be an identifiable service - which is at a location, rather than the location itself). If provided then this overrides the value provided on the availability resource
target.comment: R5 `Slot.serviceType` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Slot.serviceType` - serviceType has change due to type change: R5 serviceType CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4B serviceType

element.display: The specialty of a practitioner that would be required to perform the service requested in this appointment

target.display: The specialty of a practitioner that would be required to perform the service requested in this appointment
target.comment: R5 `Slot.specialty` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot.specialty`

element.display: Date/Time that the slot is to begin

target.display: Date/Time that the slot is to begin
target.comment: R5 `Slot.start` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot.start`

element.display: busy | free | busy-unavailable | busy-tentative | entered-in-error

target.display: busy | free | busy-unavailable | busy-tentative | entered-in-error
target.comment: R5 `Slot.status` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/slotstatus|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/slotstatus|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Slot.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Slot.text`
